title: না, এই টুইট বিল গেটসের নয়
subtitle: DailyO.in Bangla is an online opinion and commentary platform which provides current affairs news and informative & in depth articles on politics, sports, lifestyle, science and technology, money, humour,art and architecture.

vclaim: I don’t want to see any tweet hating on Muslims for slaughtering animals, about 1 million animals killed each day by KFC, McDonalds, Burger King etc. too feed the rich & making hella money out of it. During Eid Muslims sacrifice them to feed the poor for Free & y’all lose ur mind
